body.p: This Standard supersedes the following Interpretations:

li.p: SIC‑11 Foreign Exchange—Capitalisation of Losses Resulting from Severe Currency Devaluations;
SIC‑19 Reporting Currency—Measurement and Presentation of Financial Statements under IAS 21 and IAS 29; and
SIC‑30 Reporting Currency—Translation from Measurement Currency to Presentation Currency.
